mapper.select:
SELECT IFNULL(c.NAME,c.nickname) AS 'name', b.goods_id AS 'goodsId', b.goods_name AS 'goodsName', a.add_time AS 'addTime', a.goods_rank AS 'goodsRank', a.contents AS 'contents', a.spec_key_name AS 'specKeyName', e.bar_code AS 'barCode', e.goods_no AS 'goodsNo' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_comment a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods b ON b.goods_id = a.goods_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users c ON c.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_spec_goods_price e ON e.goods_id = a.goods_id AND e.spec_key = a.spec_key WHERE a.parent_id = '0' AND e.del_flag = 0
AND a.add_time >= #{beginDate} AND a.add_time <= #{endDate}

SELECT , u.nickname AS 'users.name', cu.name AS 'user.name' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_beauty_comment AS b LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users AS u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user AS cu ON b.beauty_id = cu.id WHERE 1=1 AND b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.reservation_id= #{reservationId} ORDER BY b.add_time DESC
SELECT evaluation_score AS rank, evaluation_count AS commentNum, buy_count AS buyCount FROM mtmydb.mtmy_goods_statistics WHERE goods_id = #{goodsId}

SELECT , b.name AS shopName, b.name AS 'office.name', d.nickname AS 'users.name', e.name AS 'user.name' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_shop_comment AS a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office AS b ON b.id = a.shop_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order AS c ON a.appt_order_id = c.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users AS d ON a.user_id = d.user_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user AS e ON e.id = a.reply_id WHERE 1=1 AND ( a.id = #{commentId} OR a.parent_id = #{commentId} ) GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.create_date ASC
